name: git.zip
description:
Included are syntax, indent, and filetype plugin files for git, gitcommit, gitconfig, gitrebase, and gitsendemail.

Earlier versions of these files are shipped with Vim as of 7.2. The latest versions of these files can be retrieved from http://github.com/tpope/vim-git, which is the official distribution.

If you're looking for a Vim interface to Git, be sure to try fugitive.vim: vimscript #2975 http://github.com/tpope/vim-fugitive
